scripts.build: for path in ./src/*.js; do filename=${path##*/}; rollup -f iife -n "$(echo "${filename%.*}" | perl -pe 's/(^|-)(\w)/\U$2/g')" --no-color "$path" | babel -f ./dist/"$filename" -o ./dist/"$filename" && uglifyjs -cm -o ./dist/"${filename%.*}".min.js --source-map="base='./dist',url='${filename%.*}.min.js.map'" ./dist/"$filename"; done; cp ./src/index.html ./dist
